page.title: 16Special Events.
page.content: The Mop is held once a year in October. They have all kinds of stalls like darts, rubber ducks, mini waltzers, and lots more. It is a popular event set up between the Chinese Restaurant and Lloyds Bank. Teddys and goldfish are fun prizes. Have you a fair or Mop in your town? Pancake day is remembered by the Womens Institute, who race along the service road near the school. Both Hillside and Alvechurch W.I. take part. Pancakes are cooked in the kitchen of the Baptist church, and there is a tossing competition which attracts the press.
